layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 406x406 clip at (3,3) size 400x400
  LayoutSVGRoot {svg} at (0,0) size 406x406
    LayoutSVGContainer {g} at (300,300) size 100x100
